item.description:
Join us for whip-poor-will spotting and a "Bring Your Own" picnic at the Civilian Conservation Corps Amphitheater behind MSSF headquarters at 6:00PM. (Last time somebody couldn't find the amphitheater. It is about 100 yards behind Myles Standish headquarters.)

The bird walk is scheduled for 6:30PM.  We will drive to Cutter Field Road (near Fearing Pond) and walk some of the fields until sundown.

We will place ourselves stategically to listen to Hermit Thrushes reluctantly give way to Whip-poor-wills as the dusk gets deeper.  For those interested, we can try for owls afterwards.  Last night as we left the board meeting, there was a Northern Saw-whet Owl calling.

Last year one "whip" almost landed on my head.  This year I promise not to move.  Someone get an image, please..........

No dogs at this event please.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Whip-poor-wills BYO picnic & bird walk
